mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.relevance_id AS "relevanceId", a.relevance_table AS "relevanceTable", a.type AS "type", a.tail_case AS "tailCase", a.tail_content AS "tailContent", a.tail_person AS "tailPerson", IFNULL( a.tail_time ,now()) AS "tailTime", a.more1 AS "more1", a.more2 AS "more2", a.more3 AS "more3", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" ,sysU.`name` as "createBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user sysU on a.create_by = sysU.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_log_tail( id, relevance_id, relevance_table, type, tail_case, tail_content, tail_person, tail_time, more1, more2, more3, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{relevanceId}, #{relevanceTable}, #{type}, #{tailCase}, #{tailContent}, #{tailPerson}, #{tailTime}, #{more1}, #{more2}, #{more3}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_log_tail SET relevance_id = #{relevanceId}, relevance_table = #{relevanceTable}, type = #{type}, tail_case = #{tailCase}, tail_content = #{tailContent}, tail_person = #{tailPerson}, tail_time = #{tailTime}, more1 = #{more1}, more2 = #{more2}, more3 = #{more3}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
